Has anyone heard of Alkalized Water help fight cancer?

View all Supplements Discussions Post A New Discussion

James_P_4

  • Add As Friend
  • Private Reply

Has anyone heard of Alkalized Water help fight cancer?

by James_P_4 on Tue May 06, 2003 12:00 AM

Quote | Reply
My father has lung cancer. He has taken two rounds of chemo and it wiped him out. were are now trying alkalized water, essiac tea, and seasilver. If anyone has advice please send us a message. Thank you Parker Family
Quote | Reply
Share

  • Add As Friend

RE: Has anyone heard of Alkalized Water help fight cancer?

by NancyC_S on Tue May 27, 2003 12:00 AM

Quote | Reply
My brother in law is using alkalized water as an adjunct to his therapies. It can be very effective. You want to raise your pH as close to 7 as possible. Cancer likes an acid environment not an alkaline environment. You must change your diet also. The water will not do it alone. Get a list of alkaline foods and eat from that. 80% alkaline and 20% acid. Send me a message if you cannot find one and I will get a list to you.
Quote | Reply
Share

RE: Has anyone heard of Alkalized Water help fight cancer?

by Tammy_W5 on Mon May 12, 2003 12:00 AM

Quote | Reply
Hi. I have breast cancer/bone metastasis and a friend of mine gave me information on the PH Miracle, which is alkalized water along with a modified diet. I have started the program, drinking green water with PH drops and eating a fairly vegan diet. There are testimonials to the effectiveness of this treatment. I don't know. I am trying this in hope it will help. The PH Miracle is the result of Robert O & Shelly R Young. Hope you find this useful.
Quote | Reply

Alkaline Water

by Brianm on Fri Mar 11, 2005 12:00 AM

Quote | Reply
I have heard many success stories from people using Alkaline water. The machines are called water ionizers. The two that were recommended to my family were the Jupiter Science Melody and Microlite. The only big difference between the two was that the Melody could be installed under the sink. It was $200.00 more. Here is a link. http://www.healthnutalternatives.com/ionizers.htm
Quote | Reply

  • Add As Friend

How to Alkalize Your Water

by Juliejules on Wed May 18, 2005 12:00 AM

Quote | Reply
I know that people have mentiond Dr. Youngs PH Miracle info. He has alklazing drops that do 2 things: raise the pH of your water and oxygenate your blood. The drops are called Prime pH and are made of Sodium Chlorite Ions in mineralized water. You put them in your water when you drink. From his book also, are his Supergreens which have 49 organic grasses and greens. They lowered my cholesterol by 57 total points, my triglycerides and bad cholesterol substantially. I have not followed his diet all the way though but am facing a breast cancer scare from "Density" found in my right breast. I am getting out my book and getting serious again. The drops can get expensive so I signed up to distribute them so I could save 25%. Anyone can do the same. email me and I can tell you how to do it. I think that the pH story has merit if you read all of the books and the people who are saving themselves. I have been lazy and only drinking my greens and prime PH but am going to get back on it. I will say when I did it for 3 weeks, i felt really great. It is hard to have fresh things on hand all of the time though. I have not heard about coral calcium helping but am interested in knowing about that as well. If I am cancerous, I am going 100% pH first and then see what happens. I do know that Dr. Young does phone consults and he has helped alot of people. One lady did my blood testing (Live blood testing) and she said he cured her of breast cancer. The Dr. could not find her lump and wanted to operate saying "it must be here somewhere". Anyway, eating pH seems alot better than the alternative of chemo if there is some time to turn things around. I am Julie
Quote | Reply
